solution_line_template: First find the total cost of the color cartridges: ${color_cartridge_cost}/cartridge * {num_color_cartridges} cartridges = $<<{color_cartridge_cost}*{num_color_cartridges}={total_color_cost}>>{total_color_cost}
Then add the cost of the black-and-white cartridge to find the total cost: ${total_color_cost} + ${bw_cartridge_cost} = $<<{total_color_cost}+{bw_cartridge_cost}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
